data.text:
Today we celebrate the power of play together.

A message from @XboxP3 on Xbox Series X|S Launch Day: https://t.co/EtD8H5HAJq

The Moon Man is always watching.

Explore all the stories of The Outer Worlds: https://t.co/klEm3yLSod https://t.co/rwMRCY5z56

You know, in the olden times, they didn't have Free Play Days.

Good thing you live in these days: https://t.co/OL8OxZd9LU https://t.co/z4Jaw98SBW
🏌 GOLF GOT MORE GAME with more levels to unlock, more XP to earn, and more gear to rock with #PGATOUR2K21 Season One Clubhouse Pass! https://t.co/5gkp4dB7uG https://t.co/pdQ1Lk65lW

Time to jump into action — Ori and the Will of the Wisps and Minecraft Dungeons are up for @thegameawards Player's Voice.

Make yours heard: https://t.co/9SBEAEC18d https://t.co/wAzmWn1ipG

It’s a modern-day Trebuchet!!! All thanks @XboxGamePassPC in honor of the Age of Empires: Definitive Collection.  #xgppc #Sponsored #colinfurze #trebuchet #metalwork
https://t.co/NWyUq4mD4x
Yakuza: Like a Dragon — what, else, do, we, have, to say? https://t.co/Fp464a5khV https://t.co/T9juYwhz4e

Time for the past to meet the present in #NHL21 ⏳🏒

Score with style in reverse retro jerseys, play with HUT Icons, and throw it way back with NHL 94 Rewind 🎮 📺

Learn more 👉 https://t.co/ElmJHbSG7R https://t.co/mpd35GzYnC

Strike a pose and capture your favourite moments in Night City with #Cyberpunk2077 Photo Mode! See it in action in our newest video.
Ready? Say cheese!📸 https://t.co/3bqAUsJKzi

Next Thursday, before #TheGameAwards, I'll be (virtually) sitting down with @lisasu @xboxp3 and Laura Miele from @ea for a discussion about the industry and what lies ahead in the next generation of gaming. https://t.co/ks4WwQGUF9

The holidays are all about playing together. And if that just so happens to lead to winning, well, we won't complain.

Play across devices with @XboxGamePass Ultimate: https://t.co/WixTuMTKDy https://t.co/9U75wwGHmh
F https://t.co/Vyx6niDJYs

Happy holidays from a gamer's best friend.

#FindYourJoy https://t.co/2p7x6PStmQ

Fluffy dogs; frizzy dogs; cuddly dogs; grumpy dogs: no matter your shape or size, you’ll be doing plenty of tail-wagging at Dogtopia’s delightful canine carnival!

Grab the free map, and explore this magical island yourself:

↣ https://t.co/PJxTQSLouD ↢ https://t.co/7kUVNUN84W

Ratings fit for an ICON 🔥

David Beckham’s Base and Mid ICON items drop in #FUT21 on December 4th ⬇

🤜 #ScoreMoreWithXbox 🤛 https://t.co/QfZ7SxvKzc

Strategize your path to victory.

Football Manager is back, optimized for Xbox Series X|S: https://t.co/2qfJEqkaJJ https://t.co/3O4uiKyFIi

The Zero Point has been exposed.

Agent Jones needs your help now: https://t.co/v6CdFS7jdh https://t.co/RG0WACF6ro
It all works out https://t.co/tuZDugQIuI

Nothing says the holidays more than fighting over a train.

The Holo-Day Bash Event is live now: https://t.co/oWTju1Zi0X https://t.co/4As32d5MOc

It's important to look your best when you're destroying hearts.

Get the latest State of Decay 2 update, now optimized for Xbox Series X|S: https://t.co/UacVPaMc2L https://t.co/RefKwmY5Bg

Gifts for gamers with discerning taste.

Shop the Xbox Winter collection:

https://t.co/UshZOLUXPC
https://t.co/lMtvPOu11H https://t.co/gmEWTFgFDE

Forged in nuclear fire.

The Brotherhood of Steel arrives in Appalachia: https://t.co/48j0uQhH2o | #Fallout76 https://t.co/cPccK6rgCQ

Red Dead Online now available to purchase as a standalone game for new players who don't own Red Dead Redemption 2.

Join millions of players in the American West, and experience a world packed with years’ worth of new features, gameplay and enhancements.

https://t.co/6le562IIHj https://t.co/c0b5Dz91Tu

Turn it up to 11.

Master the SUPER GORE NEST and more in the latest update to DOOM Eternal: https://t.co/t3lbcXLxom https://t.co/O6HiwxT1Xx
It’s back! The new Xbox Series X Hooded Union Suit is now available for pre-order for limited release at US & Canada Microsoft Stores https://t.co/L1Pke7s04Y https://t.co/JIJBeuGv35

Crime pays.

Build your empire: https://t.co/VGTQPt34rs https://t.co/JB4ihxNmEy

Trust nobody, not even your reflection.

Unravel the truth in Twin Mirror: https://t.co/ofHoveF3Yt https://t.co/wwf4BqUmQ3

Brand new free content for awesome arcade racer #HotshotRacing is available now on #XboxOne!

Want to get your hands on these amazing 3D car models?

Share your greatest clips from new game mode 'Barrell Barrage' using #HotshotReds or #HotshotBlues for a chance to win 🏎️💥 https://t.co/j3YGcIikKR

How do you beat a minotaur? Don't let them hit you.

Myths come alive in Immortals Fenyx Rising: https://t.co/l8pf6zET0p https://t.co/OJ7eBtDAKy

The hunt is on!

Unlock over 100 rewards with the Season Pass.

https://t.co/GfZCAi0gIc https://t.co/KaGIlZFwJ2

Don't worry, when you die, you don't die. You just age. Every single time.

Explore the labyrinth: https://t.co/ZUT8nRHEjr https://t.co/UUUUiotaFM

Puzzlers 🤝 Shooters

December's Games with Gold: https://t.co/ZS5jLeJPOn https://t.co/wXT2LB2xxd

You have two more days to get 33% off #PES2021 during the @Xbox Black Friday sales! 🙌🤩 
👉🏼 https://t.co/lCz0d5cIzy https://t.co/Lg6hPJdJ72

One foot in the real world, one in the spirit world.

Enter the world of The Medium: https://t.co/mzAkguotoK https://t.co/LJn2o1p4bo

Even the gods need saving sometimes.

Embark on a mythological adventure: https://t.co/uoow6r64Z4 https://t.co/HecYrqGBLY

Next-gen console update:
🌊 More dynamic backgrounds
✅ Optimized for Series X|S badges
👀 Auto HDR indicator

And, somehow, even more. Full details here: https://t.co/MNTJqot5Ab https://t.co/b5iA7jHE1w
Respawn and try again

Our holiday sales are almost over.

Do a last minute savings speedrun: https://t.co/OALZTGDfhO https://t.co/k1sp2HBxah
Picking the nice dialogue option even though you want to pick the mean one is called personal growth
What’s an older game that still holds a spot in your heart?
